# Copilot instructions

- [ ] Follow [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md) for repository conventions and workflow, if available
- [ ] For markdown changes, follow [STYLE_GUIDE.md](../STYLE_GUIDE.md)
- [ ] For documentation changes, follow [docs/contributions/documentation.md](../docs/contributions/documentation.md)
- [ ] Keep changes minimal
- [ ] Avoid committing generated/runtime artifacts
